name: 9 Lives, Pre-Alpha
description:
9 Lives v0.4 - Pre-Alpha

feedback survey: https://tinyurl.com/meowjump

Play in full-screen to avoid hiding parts of the screen.

space = jump

a, d = move

hold shift = walk

w = grapple ledge when within range

9 Lives is a high-stakes, 2D platformer in which a cute, fluffy cat jumps their way to the top of a towering skyscraper. Grapple your way upwards to see the beautiful sunrise, but be careful where your little paws land - one misstep and you might fall all the way back down to the streets below.

Developed by: Kyo Tetsukin,  Iyo Matsumoto and Jacob Ruttenberg with Music by Seowon Hyun.

Made in collaboration with the USC Games and Geidai. Full Release coming Summer 2021.
